remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有点沿垂直方向行到任何行都均为相同颜色。All points along any line perpendicular to the orientation line are the same color. 起始行垂直于方向行，并传递一个矩形的角变。The starting line is perpendicular to the orientation line and passes through one of the corners of the rectangle. 起始线上的所有点都是起始颜色。All points on the starting line are the starting color. 然后结束行与方向线垂直并传递一个矩形的角变。Then ending line is perpendicular to the orientation line and passes through one of the corners of the rectangle. 上的结束行的所有点都均为结束颜色。All points on the ending line are the ending color. 方向线的角度确定起始和结束行传递的角。The angle of the orientation line determines which corners the starting and ending lines pass through. 例如，如果角度是介于 0 到 90 度之间，起始行将经过的左上角中，并通过右下角中传递的结束行。For example, if the angle is between 0 and 90 degrees, the starting line passes through the upper-left corner, and the ending line passes through the lower-right corner.
